# Takeoff Physical requirements

During the takeoff, the task requires the surfer to move 75% of their body weight in less than a second @parsonageUpperBodyStrengthMeasures2020 

# Examination

## Iso Push-up

- Isometric Push-up (IPU) @parsonageUpperBodyStrengthMeasures2020
- The patient maintains a straight line between torso and upper body while keeping the elbows at 100&deg; flexion @parsonageUpperBodyStrengthMeasures2020 
- Increased iso push-up force correlated with decreased time to takeoff/pop-up @parsonageUpperBodyStrengthMeasures2020

## Dynamic Push-Up (DPU)

- Dynamic Push-up (DPU) @parsonageUpperBodyStrengthMeasures2020
- Increased dynamic push-up force correlated with decreased time to takeoff/pop-up @parsonageUpperBodyStrengthMeasures2020
